title: [Heijin] Aquarian Age & Saga II [DVDrip]
description:
English:

Kyouta and his friends Shingo and Jun dream of becoming a big-time rock 'n' roll band. Kyouta's childhood friend Yokko supports them as they work to make their dream come true. Just as things start to turn in their favor, however, Kyouta learns that there are greater forces at work and an Earth-shattering conflict is about to begin. What part will Yokko and Kyouta play in the events to come?
